SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest

Class DemographicService

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.AbstractServiceImpl
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.DemographicService
@Path("/demographics") @Component("demographicService") @Consumes("application/json") public class DemographicService extends AbstractServiceImpl
Defines a service contract for main operations on demographic.

  • Method Details

    • getAllDemographics

      @GET public OscarSearchResponse<DemographicTo1> getAllDemographics(@QueryParam("offset") Integer offset, @QueryParam("limit") Integer limit)
      Finds all demographics.

      In case limit or offset parameters are set to null or zero, the entire result set is returned.

      Parameters:
      offset - First record in the entire result set to be returned
      limit - Maximum total number of records that should be returned
      Returns:
      Returns all demographics.

    • getDemographicData

      @GET @Path("/{dataId}") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DemographicTo1 getDemographicData(@PathParam("dataId") Integer id, @QueryParam("includes[]") List<String> include) throws PatientDirectiveException
      Gets detailed demographic data.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the demographic to get data for
      Returns:
      Returns data for the demographic provided
      Throws:
      PatientDirectiveException

    • getBasicDemographicData

      @GET @Path("/basic/{dataId}") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DemographicTo1 getBasicDemographicData(@PathParam("dataId") Integer id, @QueryParam("includes[]") List<String> includes) throws PatientDirectiveException
      Gets basic demographic data.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the demographic to get data for
      includes - An array of strings that include additional information in the returned data Possible includes are: - contacts = includes the DemographicContacts in the results
      Returns:
      Returns data for the demographic provided
      Throws:
      PatientDirectiveException

    • getDemographicSummary

      @GET @Path("/summary/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") public DemographicTo1 getDemographicSummary(@PathParam("demographicNo") Integer demographicNo)
      Returns a shorter summary of the Demographic profile. Reduces bandwidth and processing time.

    • createDemographicData

      @POST @Consumes("application/json") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DemographicTo1 createDemographicData(DemographicTo1 data)
      Saves demographic information.
      Parameters:
      data - Detailed demographic data to be saved
      Returns:
      Returns the saved demographic data

    • updateDemographicData

      @PUT @Consumes("application/json") public DemographicTo1 updateDemographicData(DemographicTo1 data)
      Updates demographic information.
      Parameters:
      data - Detailed demographic data to be updated
      Returns:
      Returns the updated demographic data

    • deleteDemographicData

      @DELETE @Path("/{dataId}") public DemographicTo1 deleteDemographicData(@PathParam("dataId") Integer id)
      Deletes demographic information.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the demographic data to be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns the deleted demographic data

    • search

      @GET @Path("/quickSearch") @Produces("application/json") public AbstractSearchResponse<DemographicSearchResult> search(@QueryParam("query") String query)
      Search demographics - used by navigation of OSCAR webapp

      Currently supports LastName[,FirstName] and address searches.

      Parameters:
      id - Id of the demographic to get data for
      Returns:
      Returns data for the demographic provided

    • search

      @POST @Path("/search") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public AbstractSearchResponse<DemographicSearchResult> search(net.sf.json.JSONObject json, @QueryParam("startIndex") Integer startIndex, @QueryParam("itemsToReturn") Integer itemsToReturn)

    • searchIntegrator

      @POST @Path("/searchIntegrator") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public AbstractSearchResponse<DemographicSearchResult> searchIntegrator(net.sf.json.JSONObject json, @QueryParam("itemsToReturn") Integer itemsToReturn)
